description: Try our easy to follow Pasta With Broccoli & Lemon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta With Broccoli & Lemon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g broccoli, broken into florets with stalks
1 medium fresh medium-hot red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the broccoli florets in a pan of boiling salted water for 10-15 minutes or until soft and slightly overcooked. Drain and dice. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the onion and a pinch of salt, and cook over a low heat for 5 minutes or until soft and translucent. Stir in the chilli, then add the wine. Raise the heat and simmer for a couple of minutes.
Lower the heat, add the lemon zest and garlic, then season well with salt and black pepper. Add the broccoli, stir, and put to one side.

Meanwhile, cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water for 10 minutes or until it is cooked but still has a bit of bite to it. Drain, keeping back a tiny amount of the cooking water. Return the pasta to the pan and toss together. Toss with the broccoli mixture, then squeeze over the lemon juice. Sprinkle with Parmesan (if using), and serve.
